Description: Initial meetings, project planning, requirements documentation
Creation of wireframes and mockups, client review and feedback
Finalizing the design for both the website and the admin panel, preparing design assets for development
HTML, CSS, JavaScript coding for website pages, responsive design implementation
PHP and MySQL development, setting up database schema, creating API endpoints
Developing admin panel for content management, user management, and site settings
Integrating front-end with back-end, ensuring all functionalities work seamlessly together
Testing individual components and features, ensuring they work as intended
Conducting tests with the client to ensure the website meets all requirements and expectations
Configuring the live server, setting up the environment, and preparing for deployment
Deploying the website to the live server, ensuring smooth operation and addressing any immediate issues
Providing support for any immediate post-deployment issues
Regular updates and maintenance for one month
